name: Action Adventure Prototype
description:
This was a school project made for a prototyping class on the subject of "action/adventure". There are currently no plans for a larger release beyond this prototype!

Check out the included readme for details on the game! YOU WILL NEED A CONTROLLER TO PLAY.

Made by:

  • Aaron Scott
  • Aaron Schmit - @theaaronschmit
  • Liam Allen-Miller - @RSSLiam
  • Pascal Lambert
